text: @SenCoryGardner @POTUS @GovofCO @realDonaldTrump Did you explain to POTUS that #VoteByMail works? #Colorado has one of the highest turnout rates in the nation. No one should be forced to risk their health in order to exercise their right to #vote. #COVID19 #coleg @COSecofState @SenatorBennet

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
